video.title: Queer as Folk USA
video.synopsis: The lives and loves of five gay men living in Pittsburgh provide the drama in this American edition of the acclaimed British series. Amid the usual ups and downs of relationships, the friends grapple with everything from health issues to politics.

episodes.synopsis: Struggling with feelings of jealousy over Brian's relationship with Justin, Michael stays in the closet as a woman co-worker becomes more interested.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: After a night out, Brian picks up a cute guy named Justin. Lindsay and Melanie have a baby boy. Michael deals with his secret feelings for Brian.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: When Lindsay and Melanie have a berith for their new baby, Brian crashes the cermony and refuses to let the baby be circumcised.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: While Ted lies in a coma, Brian learns he's the executor of his friend's will. Justin's mother begins to suspect the truth about her son's sexuality.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Michael starts to date a handsome chiropractor. Brian is propositioned by an important client. Justin struggles with his relationship with his mother.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Ted recovers from his near-fatal overdose by dating Roger, an overweight chorus director. Dr. David gets into a tug-of-war with Brian over Michael.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: When Michael and Dr. David spend a weekend in the country, Brian's emotional hold on Michael and his dislike for Dr. David intensify.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Justin's father assaults Brian outside Babylon, prompting Justin to leave home and move in with Brian. Michael gets a promotion at work.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Lindsay and Melanie ask Brian to give up his parental rights to Gus. Emmett's addiction to cyber-sex begins to invade his reality.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Dr. David continues to pressure Michael to move in. After his loft is burglarized, Brian blames Justin. Lindsay and Melanie begin to drift apart.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Michael ends his relationship with Dr. David. Ted and Emmett get tested for AIDS. Brian throws a surprise 30th birthday party for Michael.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Michael and Dr. David reconcile. Lindsay and Melanie fight about Brian, finances and their future together. Emmett joins a "conversion" therapy group.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Brian sleeps with a co-worker who then files a complaint. Emmett continues efforts to go straight. Melanie meets another woman.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Brian is named in a sexual harassment lawsuit and consults with Melanie for legal advice. In his effort to go straight, Emmett dates a woman.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Lindsay leaves Gus with Brian for a weekend away. Dr. David introduces his son to Michael. Ted takes a walk on the wild side with an old college pal.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Michael and Dr. David fight about finances. A strange Frenchman moves in with Lindsay and Gus. Justin is suspended from school.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Dr. David and Michael host a high-society fundraiser, but Michael excludes his friends. Justin continues to be harassed at school.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Dr. David is discovered at the baths by Brian, causing Michael to wonder about their future. Justin finds out his parents are getting a divorce.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: In the throes of a hot session, Brian gets some upsetting news. Justin's classmate Daphne asks him to be her "first." Ted continues to see Blake.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: The King of Babylon contest produces some surprise contestants. Brian is beaten at his own game. An innocent trip to the mall lands Vic in jail.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: After being chosen Ad Person of the Year, Brian is encouraged to take his talent to New York City. Vic appears in court to plead his case.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Brian turns 30. Ted finally faces the truth about Blake. Michael and Dr. David prepare to move to Portland.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Suffering trauma after the bashing, Justin can't remember the fateful night but Brian can't forget it. Lindsay pops "the" question to Melanie.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Despite Brian's efforts, Justin can't deal with Hobbs's attack. Ted is fired for surfing porn at work. Michael and Emmett take jobs as naked waiters.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Ted's favorite author protests Brian receiving a Hero Award for saving Justin. Michael wants to reconnect with Brian at the comic convention.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Brian, Michael, Justin, Emmett, Ted, Lindsay, Melanie and Debbie all overcome obstacles to show their pride in Pittsburgh's annual parade.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Having lost hand control from his bashing, Justin quits art school. Michael quits the Big Q and risks everything to buy a comic book store.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Justin and Brian negotiate their relationship. Thanks to Emmett, Ted's new business flourishes. Melanie shares a dirty little secret.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Michael continues dating Ben; Lindsay and Melanie struggle to get the money for their wedding; success on Ted's porn Web site swells Emmett's ego.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Trying to forget Ben, Michael reenters the dating scene. Justin has an encounter with someone closer to his own age.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Michael tries to get back with Ben by proving he can deal with his HIV; Brian is introduced to his mother's minister -- but they've already met.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Michael mourns the death of his comic book hero, Captain Astro. Behind the diner, Debbie discovers a murder victim. Emmett helps George enjoy life.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: It's Lindsay and Melanie's wedding day and if they can overcome the many obstacles fate has thrown in their path, it promises to be a great day.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Michael has trouble dealing with the news that Ben once slept with Brian. Debbie impresses Detective Horvath with her sleuthing.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Divina Devore, Pittsburgh's drag queen, comes back to town. Melanie and Lindsay struggle to get Gus accepted to a private preschool.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Even though his grades are suffering, Justin is making too much money as a dancer to care. George offers to take Emmett on a world tour.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Michael and Justin collaborate to create their own comic book. Melanie and Lindsay enlist Leda to renovate their attic.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: When Brian ignores Justin's birthday, Melanie and Lindsay take him to a violin concert where he meets the talented Ethan. Ted falls for Luke.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: To impress his boss at work, Brian has to cancel plans with Justin. Emmett receives a very generous inheritance from George's estate.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: When Ben is hospitalized, Michael's worst fears come true. Emmett considers a million-dollar offer to keep his relationship with George a secret.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Michael is tempted to expose Justin's affair with Ethan to Brian. Ted has become immune to porn. Melanie and Lindsay ask Leda to leave.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Justin is forced to choose between Brian and Ethan. Ben is going away for six months but only if he has Michael's blessing. Ted's in love.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Michael and Justin face uncertainty over the future of their comic book. Ted and Emmett explore the possibilities of a relationship.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Having left Brian, Justin must find a way to pay for school. Much to Lindsay's surprise, Melanie expresses her desire to have another baby.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Brian lends his expertise to the center's Carnivale fundraiser and considers Lindsay and Melanie's sperm-donation request. Ben's former partner dies.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Lindsay and Melanie ask Michael to father their second child. Brian's accused of molesting his nephew. Ted has a hard time with Emmett's untidiness.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Brian wins Police Chief Stockwell's mayoral race account much to his friends' dismay. Ethan is offered representation after the Heifetz competition.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: With Brian's help Stockwell takes the lead in the polls. Ted readies Jerk-at-work.net for any police raids. Ethan gives Justin a surprise performance.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Ted is out on bail and begs Brian to talk to Stockwell on his behalf. Justin confronts Ethan. Melanie is pregnant, much to everyone's delight.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Michael and Ben help a young hustler. Justin begins an internship at Vanguard and is on a quest to win Brian back. Lindsay blossoms in her new job.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Woody's is closed down after an amateur strip contest. Stockwell discovers Brian's gay. Ted's humiliated when he tends bar at one of Emmett's soirees.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Brian and Justin clash over Stockwell. Ted takes a dangerous detour on his way to a weekend getaway. Hunter calls in a favor from Ben.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Brian is fired for undermining Stockwell's campaign. Ben and Michael tell Hunter he's HIV-positive. Ted's tempted to go to his first White Party.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Brian investigates the death of Dumpster Boy based on a tip from Hunter. Emmett is furious when Melanie and Lindsay insist Ted's an addict.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Hunter collects evidence tying Dumpster Boy's murder to Stockwell. Justin risks expulsion when he refuses to apologize for his anti-Stockwell posters.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Brian risks everything to bring down Stockwell on the eve of the election. Ted finally hits rock bottom. Hunter's mother arrives to take him away.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Deep in debt, Brian faces giving up the lifestyle he's grown accustomed to. Meanwhile, Michael and Hunter head to Pittsburgh for the custody hearing.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Brian decides to start his own agency. Meanwhile, Ted tries to adjust to life after rehab, and Justin urges a friend to push back against his bashers.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Brian warns Justin about his involvement with Cody and the Pink Posse. Elsewhere, Ted starts a new job but continues to push away his friends.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: When Brian runs into a snag with his new agency, he turns to Ted for help. Later, a social worker's visit with Michael and Ben doesn't go as planned.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Ted accepts Brian's offer of a job at Kinnetik. Meanwhile, Cody takes Justin to the firing range, and Melanie lends her support to the custody case.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Michael and Justin receive an offer to turn "Rage" into a movie. Elsewhere, Debbie and Vic get into a heated argument that will change their lives.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Brian is diagnosed with testicular cancer. Elsewhere, Ted falls back into old habits.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Justin learns that Brian didn't go to Ibiza. Meanwhile, Michael and Justin meet with a Hollywood producer, and Debbie has a talk with Horvath.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Justin discovers why Brian has thrown him out. Elsewhere, a professional football player makes a move on Emmett.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Brian grapples with the effects of his surgery. Meanwhile, a former student of Ben's creates a rift between him and Michael.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Brian goes head-to-head with the fund-raiser hired by the center. Meanwhile, Ben and Michael suspect that Hunter may be hustling again.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Brian decides to participate in the Liberty Ride. Elsewhere, Hunter reveals to Callie that he's HIV-positive.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Emmett supports Ted by signing up for the Liberty Ride. Elsewhere, Lindsay goes to Brian for advice about Melanie.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Michael and Ben have trouble crossing into the United States as a married couple. Meanwhile, Melanie goes into labor.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Michael throws a 10th-anniversary party for Melanie and Lindsay. Meanwhile, Justin's extended stay in Hollywood affects his relationship with Brian.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Brian reopens Babylon. Meanwhile, Justin returns to Pittsburgh after the studio pulls the plug on "Rage," and Michael pursues custody of his daughter.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Brian and Michael grow further apart as Brian struggles to save Liberty Avenue from gentrification and Michael embraces domestic life.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Debbie struggles with accepting her role as a lady of leisure. Elsewhere, Ted decides to undergo an extreme makeover.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Brian has news to share with all of his former partners and Justin. Meanwhile, Hunter considers returning to the streets.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Brian's reign as the hottest man at Babylon is challenged. Meanwhile, Ben and Michael try to lift Hunter's spirits, and Debbie goes back to the diner.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: A ballot proposition threatens the rights of same-sex couples. Meanwhile, Lindsay moves back into her parents' house with Gus.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Justin lands in jail. Elsewhere, Brian and Brandon work their way down the list of the 10 hottest guys in Pittsburgh.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: The gang fights against Proposition 14.  Meanwhile, Drew finally comes out, and Ted begins his quest to find Mr. Right.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Cyndi Lauper turns up when Babylon plays host to a "Stop Prop. 14" benefit -- an event that will change many lives.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: After the bombing of Babylon, Brian reevaluates his priorities, and a Liberty Avenue vigil for the victims ends in chaos.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Brian and Justin announce that they're getting married. Meanwhile, Ted may have found Mr. Right, and Emmett catches Drew with another man.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: As Brian and Justin prepare to wed, Lindsay and Melanie get ready to move to Canada, and Ted sees his relationship with Tad for what it really is.
episodes.title: Episode 13
